mapper.select: select apply_id,u_id, apply_time, apply_state, apply_identity_code, apply_identity_code_front, apply_identity_code_back from apply where apply_id = #{applyId}

select apply_id,u_id, apply_time, apply_state, apply_identity_code, apply_identity_code_front, apply_identity_code_back from apply
limit #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into apply(u_id,apply_time, apply_state, apply_identity_code, apply_identity_code_front, apply_identity_code_back) values (#{uId},#{applyTime}, #{applyState}, #{applyIdentityCode}, #{applyIdentityCodeFront}, #{applyIdentityCodeBack})

insert into apply(u_id,apply_time, apply_state, apply_identity_code, apply_identity_code_front, apply_identity_code_back) values
(#{entity.uId},#{entity.applyTime}, #{entity.applyState}, #{entity.applyIdentityCode}, #{entity.applyIdentityCodeFront}, #{entity.applyIdentityCodeBack})

insert into apply(u_id,apply_time, apply_state, apply_identity_code, apply_identity_code_front, apply_identity_code_back) values
(#{entity.uId},#{entity.applyTime}, #{entity.applyState}, #{entity.applyIdentityCode}, #{entity.applyIdentityCodeFront}, #{entity.applyIdentityCodeBack})
on duplicate key update u_id = values(u_id), apply_time = values(apply_time), apply_state = values(apply_state), apply_identity_code = values(apply_identity_code), apply_identity_code_front = values(apply_identity_code_front), apply_identity_code_back = values(apply_identity_code_back)
mapper.update:
update apply
u_id = #{uId},
apply_time = #{applyTime},
apply_state = #{applyState},
apply_identity_code = #{applyIdentityCode},
apply_identity_code_front = #{applyIdentityCodeFront},
apply_identity_code_back = #{applyIdentityCodeBack},
where apply_id = #{applyId}
